data.lyric:
[ti:Settling Down]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:Wildcard]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Settling Down - Miranda Lambert
[00:06.77]Lyrics by：Miranda Lambert/Luke Dick/Natalie Hemby
[00:13.54]Composed by：Miranda Lambert/Luke Dick/Natalie Hemby
[00:20.31]Should I give up sunsets
[00:23.08]For marigold mornings
[00:25.68]Should I look for rainbows
[00:28.24]Or wait for the rain
[00:30.83]Is happiness on the highway
[00:33.59]Or is it parked in the driveway
[00:36.35]Should I lean on you babe
[00:38.91]Or should you lean on me
[00:42.38]Am I looking for comfort
[00:43.60]Am I looking for an escape
[00:47.82]Am I looking for you
[00:49.08]Am I looking the other way
[00:53.00]I'm a little wild child and a homing pigeon
[00:56.38]Caravan and an empty kitchen
[00:58.44]Bare feet on the tile with my head up in the clouds
[01:04.35]One heart going both directions
[01:06.99]One love and a couple of questions
[01:08.98]Am I settling up
[01:10.53]Or settling down
[01:14.37]Am I settling up
[01:16.01]Or settling down
[01:19.02]I could plant a pretty garden
[01:21.54]Or just send myself flowers
[01:24.34]Be a jet set Friday
[01:26.28]Or a Sunday hometown girl
[01:29.68]I could stay a little lonely
[01:32.50]Or let you get to know me
[01:34.93]Yeah I could love a picket fence
[01:37.00]If it wrapped around the world
[01:41.03]I'm a little wild child and a homing pigeon
[01:44.37]Caravan and an empty kitchen
[01:46.56]Bare feet on the tile with my head up in the clouds
[01:52.24]I'm one heart going both directions
[01:55.01]One love and a couple of questions
[01:57.07]Am I settling up
[01:58.60]Or settling down
[02:13.13]Am I looking for comfort
[02:14.51]Am I looking for an escape
[02:18.42]Am I looking for you
[02:19.56]Am I looking the other way
[02:23.64]I'm a little wild child and a homing pigeon
[02:26.97]Caravan and an empty kitchen
[02:29.18]Bare feet on the tile with my head up in the clouds
[02:35.02]One heart going both directions
[02:37.70]One love and a couple of questions
[02:39.70]Am I settling up
[02:41.20]Or settling down
[02:45.06]Am I settling up
[02:46.59]Or settling down
data.trans:
[ti:Settling Down]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:Wildcard]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.77]//
[00:13.54]//
[00:20.31]我应该放弃落日风景
[00:23.08]拥抱美丽黎明吗
[00:25.68]我应该寻找彩虹
[00:28.24]还是等待下雨
[00:30.83]幸福很快就会到来吗
[00:33.59]还是说已经到达家门口
[00:36.35]我应该依靠你吗 宝贝
[00:38.91]或者说你应该依靠我吗
[00:42.38]我是不是在寻求安慰
[00:43.60]我是不是在寻求出路
[00:47.82]我是不是在寻找你
[00:49.08]我是不是在寻找别的方法
[00:53.00]我是个野孩子 一只信鸽
[00:56.38]一辆大篷车 一间空厨房
[00:58.44]赤脚踩在瓷砖上 不知所措 一片茫然
[01:04.35]一颗心 朝着两个方向前进
[01:06.99]一份爱 好多问题
[01:08.98]我还在坚持吗
[01:10.53]还是说我在妥协
[01:14.37]我还在坚持吗
[01:16.01]还是说我在妥协
[01:19.02]我可以建一座漂亮的花园
[01:21.54]给我自己送花
[01:24.34]周五做个富豪
[01:26.28]或者周日做个回乡姑娘
[01:29.68]我可以继续孤单下去
[01:32.50]也可以让你了解我
[01:34.93]就算是被藩篱包围 我也可以接受
[01:37.00]只要全世界都是如此就行了
[01:41.03]我是个野孩子 一只信鸽
[01:44.37]一辆大篷车 一间空厨房
[01:46.56]赤脚踩在瓷砖上 不知所措 一片茫然
[01:52.24]我这一颗心 朝着两个方向前进
[01:55.01]一份爱 好多问题
[01:57.07]我还在坚持吗
[01:58.60]还是说我在妥协
[02:13.13]我是不是在寻求安慰
[02:14.51]我是不是在寻求出路
[02:18.42]我是不是在寻找你
[02:19.56]我是不是在寻找别的方法
[02:23.64]我是个野孩子 一只信鸽
[02:26.97]一辆大篷车 一间空厨房
[02:29.18]赤脚踩在瓷砖上 不知所措 一片茫然
[02:35.02]一颗心 朝着两个方向前进
[02:37.70]一份爱 好多问题
[02:39.70]我还在坚持吗
[02:41.20]还是说我在妥协
[02:45.06]我还在坚持吗
[02:46.59]还是说我在妥协
